data.name: VEGA Conflict - Exodus Pack
data.detailed_description:
New to VEGA Conflict? Jump start your epic war in space with the Exodus Pack:

Exodus Cruiser (x12) - The wide firing arc and extra armor of the Exodus Cruiser makes it ideal to lead your fleet into battle and blitz out your enemy.

1,500 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to boost the attacking power of your Exodus Cruisers:

- Scatter Missile III (x36)
- Spectral Shield II (x12)
- Plasteel III (x36)
data.about_the_game:
New to VEGA Conflict? Jump start your epic war in space with the Exodus Pack:

Exodus Cruiser (x12) - The wide firing arc and extra armor of the Exodus Cruiser makes it ideal to lead your fleet into battle and blitz out your enemy.

1,500 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits to boost the attacking power of your Exodus Cruisers:

- Scatter Missile III (x36)
- Spectral Shield II (x12)

data.short_description: Jump start your epic war in space with the Exodus Pack! Buy now and get Exodus Cruisers! These ships will make a fine armada for any new rebel.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
